Description:
You come across a small shop, and as you approach, a man comes out from behind the counter and says to you:

"Hello travellers, are you lost in this place too? After years of wandering these ruins I have collected everything that seemed useful and set up this shop. Take a look if you like.

I am also willing to buy any precious gems or rare items you may have, as well as offer you a small discount."
DescriptionAction: Do you want to buy something?
